solution_line_template: On Wednesday, Liza had ${initial_balance} - ${rent_paid} = $<<{initial_balance}-{rent_paid}={balance_after_rent}>>{balance_after_rent} left in her account.
After depositing on Thursday, she had ${balance_after_rent} + ${paycheck_deposited} = $<<{balance_after_rent}+{paycheck_deposited}={balance_after_deposit}>>{balance_after_deposit} in her account.
On Friday, she paid a total of ${electricity_bill} + ${internet_bill} = $<<{electricity_bill}+{internet_bill}={total_friday_bills}>>{total_friday_bills} for her electricity and internet bills.
So, ${balance_after_deposit} - ${total_friday_bills} = $<<{balance_after_deposit}-{total_friday_bills}={balance_after_friday_bills}>>{balance_after_friday_bills} was left on her account on Friday.
After paying her phone bill, Liza has ${balance_after_friday_bills} - ${phone_bill} = $<<{balance_after_friday_bills}-{phone_bill}={final_balance}>>{final_balance} left in her account.
